He said hey bro what kind of protein powder do you use? And I thought about saying something funny or cool but instead I just said whey because I don't know anything else besides whey. But then we both walked away. We were two guys who didn't have time to waste our lives talking to each other right now. That is how you grow up, okay? You gotta keep moving forward."

script.text: I got back home later that day and my brother called me up, he goes, yo man, did you see the video I posted today? I was like, nope. What'd happen? He says, all right, calm down, everybody. This is crazy stuff here. It happened last night. A woman fell onto these train tracks and she died. Everybody stay safe out there. And he hit send before adding that her body burned, which made the whole thing seem less urgent."

And for those of y'all not familiar, whenever somebody dies on television, whether it be a show or a movie, as soon as their character gets killed, if you watch an episode of The Walking Dead where Negan hits somebody with Lucille, everybody in America stops doing whatever they're doing to watch the rest of that show."

So I'm watching TV, and it happens every single season when someone new gets murdered on Game of Thrones, everybody's texting me going, oh my god! Did you hear about this poor girl who died getting run over by a car on live television?"
